system.requirements:
Tier 1; Intelligence 35
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Knowledge
system.effect: Whenever character or their Comrade fire a weapon with the indirect quality, if at least on hit lands within Intelligence Bonus Metres of an enemy, the target must make a +20 Pinning Test.
